dashboard.title: Your Projects
dashboard.subtitle: Manage your translation projects
dashboard.noProjectsDescription: Create your first project to start managing translations
dashboard.deleteConfirm: Delete this project? This cannot be undone.

createProject.title: Create New Project
createProject.heading: Start a New Translation Project
createProject.description: Connect your GitHub repository to manage translations
createProject.projectNameHelp: A friendly name for your project

joinProject.title: Join Project
joinProject.heading: Join an Existing Project
joinProject.description: Enter the project ID to join and start translating
joinProject.projectIdHelp: Get the project ID from the project owner
joinProject.noProjectsDescription: All projects have been joined or there are no public projects

languageSelection.title: Select Language
languageSelection.noLanguagesDescription: Upload translation files to get started

fileSelection.title: Select File
fileSelection.noFilesDescription: Upload translation files for this language

projectSettings.title: Project Settings
projectSettings.deleteProjectDescription: Once you delete a project, there is no going back. Please be certain.
projectSettings.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this project? This action cannot be undone.

translationHistory.title: Translation History
translationHistory.noHistoryDescription: Start translating to see your contribution history
translationHistory.enterSearch: Enter search criteria and click Search

translationSuggestions.title: Translation Suggestions
translationSuggestions.description: Review and approve community translation suggestions

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.authError: Authentication error. Please sign in again.
errors.permissionDenied: You don't have permission to access this resource
